channel.title: Error with running, help apreciated
channel.description: Ok, basicly when i run my server everything is fine, everything runs as it should, people connect absolutely fine. but after about 2-3minutes of the server being run i get this error: [IMG]http://i174.photobucket.com/albums/w95/JD119/Error.jpg[/img] i was recently attacked by syipkpker, but i have no idea if that is what is causing it, also because the recent sueings against hosters i am using utorrent to forward my port (it much less detectable) any help is greatly appriciated :P

item.title: Error with running, help apreciated
item.dc:creator: @TheMyth TheMyth
item.description:
@TheMyth wrote:

um ive noticed that the recent code ive added that makes you get a character design thing at 1st login may be the roblem, while changing around the code i got from it i get the error faster, or i get more time, ill try wiping out the pieces of code 4 it if i cant get it to work, thanks for help so far and any more would be appriciated, thanks[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 30, 2008, 02:48:15 pm[/size][hr]ok i cant get it to work so ive wiped out the code i recently added, if any1 can figure out what i did wrong then heres the code i used

if (started == 0) { sendMessage("Welcome to Myth Scape!"); sendMessage("Mod and admin spots are not open!!!"); sendMessage("Latest Update: Myth Scape Pkz up!"); sendMessage("Forums: Mythscape.com/smfforfree2"); sendMessage("Type ::Starter 2 get ur pk gear!"); sendMessage("Server coder and owner: The Myth"); sendMessage("Please do ::info 4 rules and commands :)"); sendMessage("Ok enjoy mi server!! :P"); showInterface(3559); started = 1; savemoreinfo(); }[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 30, 2008, 02:49:02 pm[/size][hr]oh… its still not working, just had a longer delay on disconnecting…[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 30, 2008, 03:03:15 pm[/size][hr]when i added this code i also told it to save the started in character file, could this error be due to me having to many things to save in the file?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 01, 2008, 12:25:00 am[/size][hr]bump, please more help is appriciated

Read full topic

item.title: Error with running, help apreciated
item.dc:creator: @M00_M00_Pk M00 M00 Pk
item.description:
@M00_M00_Pk wrote:

Ah, I see what you’re getting at.
I didn’t notice the 'String’OutofBoundsExeption.

:o

SImple mistake, sorry.

item.title: Error with running, help apreciated
item.dc:creator: @x_blitz_x x blitz x
item.description:
@x_blitz_x wrote:

[quote=“M00 M00 Pk, post:3, topic:234101”]He hasn’t got anything wrong in his code, i suggest re-portforwarding.
Something is Out of Bounds, so it’s best to change the ports and the client will accept the info coming from a refreshed port.

Oh and also get rid of your icky Olive 98 Theme! :P[/quote]

Your wrong, he does have something wrong with his code.

public class StringIndexOutOfBoundsException extends [url=http://java.sun.com/j2se/1.4.2/docs/api/java/lang/IndexOutOfBoundsException.html]IndexOutOfBoundsException[/url]

Thrown by String methods to indicate that an index is either negative or greater than the size of the string. For some methods such as the charAt method, this exception also is thrown when the index is equal to the size of the string.

Read full topic

item.title: Error with running, help apreciated
item.dc:creator: @jay689 jay689
item.description:
@jay689 wrote:

Its DEFINITLY Not portforwarding or the other players connection wouldnt even appear, trust me on that 1

and m00 m00 pk you seem to be posting after everything i post lol.

item.title: Error with running, help apreciated
item.dc:creator: @M00_M00_Pk M00 M00 Pk
item.description:
@M00_M00_Pk wrote:

He hasn’t got anything wrong in his code, i suggest re-portforwarding.
Something is Out of Bounds, so it’s best to change the ports and the client will accept the info coming from a refreshed port.

Oh and also get rid of your icky Olive 98 Theme!

Read full topic

item.description:
@jay689 wrote:

wern’t a SYI, it was something youve recently added that has gone wrong/ been added wrong, just simply delete it, and itll run, also when you compile do u get errors ?
